remarks: Value of the scalar sigma map at zero.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hgmapval0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmapval0.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapval0.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmapval0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
hgmapval0.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapval0.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmapval0 $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` .0. ) = .0. ) $.
